techmeme.title: Study: gTLDs like .shop and .xyz, which had 11% market share for new domains, accounted for ~37% of cybercrime domains reported between Sep. 2023 and Aug. 2024 (Brian Krebs/Krebs on Security)
A look at the opportunities India provides for smartphone companies, including its growing market for premium phones and as a manufacturing hub outside of China (Andrew Williams/Wired)
Dell'Oro Group expects global investment in data centers to rise ~30% YoY to $463.7B in 2025, with about half coming from Amazon, Microsoft, Google, and Meta (Ryotaro Yamada/Nikkei Asia)
Apple faces a lawsuit accusing it of failing to implement a system that detects and removes CSAM from iCloud, despite initially developing such a tool in 2021 (Tripp Mickle/New York Times)
The rise of generative AI will force the web browser to evolve again, just as the web browser evolved for a mobile-first world by contorting itself into apps (Om Malik/Crazy Stupid Tech)
